1.title: The Blind Reader
1.plot: A woman shocked by the poor reading skills of many children in her community creates a literacy program. Now over 300 children attend her weekly reading sessions; and are on hand for her living room transformation.

2.title: The Art of Giving
2.plot: After winning his battle with cancer, a brave 8-year-old boy creates a fundraising calendar with his own art, and raises thousands of dollars for cancer research. The Makeover Wish team surprises him with a bedroom of his own, with plenty of space for his new creations.

3.title: Pads Pal
3.plot: For years this dedicated volunteer has been breeding assistance dogs for the Pacific Assistance Dogs Society. These extraordinary animals go on to help special needs adults live independently. When the Makeover Wish team arrives to transform her living room and dining room, she is overcome with emotion.

4.title: The Generous Carpenter
4.plot: In their spare time, these former school teachers have helped repair many houses in their town, including a massive renovation to a home for adults with intellectual disabilities. This couple is overcome with emotion as The Makeover Wish team thanks them with a magnificent basement.

5.title: Rick the Rescuer
5.plot: Hundreds of lives have been saved thanks to the efforts of this volunteer Search and Rescue team manager, Rick. In this episode, Rick's team takes charge to help create a stunning family room to relax in.

6.title: Speaking from the Heart
6.plot: A motivational speaker with Cerebral Palsy helps others overcome challenges and turn them into opportunities. As someone who was bullied as a child, he's passionate about making a difference in the lives of kids. The Makeover Wish team makes a difference in his life by giving his neglected home a much-needed face-lift.

7.title: Safety Net
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Big Sister, Little Sister
8.plot: For many years she has been a supportive "Big Sister", mentoring young women in her community. Now one of her former "Little Sisters" teams up with the Makeover Wish team to convert her rec room into a fun hangout space to enjoy with her current and future "Little Sisters".

9.title: Life Saving Boys
9.plot: Two brothers combine bravery and swimming skills to save their injured great grandfather from a drowning in a hotel swimming pool. The Makeover Wish team creates a cool new rec room for these young heroes.

10.title: Everyone Can Play
10.plot: This award winning coach and athlete is passionate about giving kids from all backgrounds the opportunity to participate in sports. That's why she launched a Kidsport Chapter in her community - a charity that provides grants and gear to kids from low-income households. Now we grant Wendy her wish by transforming her dated bedroom into a European styled boutique hotel room.

11.title: The Dang Gang
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: The Optimist
12.plot: After losing her leg to cancer almost 20 years ago, this woman has devoted her time and energy to volunteering in the community. Now, the Makeover Team is focusing their energy on turning her dated and awkwardly shaped living room into an attractive, functional space.

13.title: Let It Be
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Miracle Child
1.plot: Against all odds, a young couple's dreams come true when they have a child. But a few months later, the new father dies, never to see his son grow up. The Makeover Wish Team honors his memory, and gives Mom and her child a beautiful place to carry on together.

2.title: Independence Day
2.plot: A young woman geared for Harvard was robbed of a normal life when a drunk driver slammed into her car. After years of relearning how to eat, walk and talk, she is finally ready for a stunning home of her own - and the Makeover Wish team is ready to make her dream come true.

3.title: Critter Queen
3.plot: A compassionate widow devotes her life to saving sick and injured wildlife - no matter how big or small. The Makeover Wish team surprises her and her beloved animals with the gift of a lifetime and a room fit for a queen.

4.title: The Pack Rat
4.plot: A selfless woman never lets her cancer and polio stand in her way of being a tireless volunteer. The Makeover Wish Team gives her the proper office and gorgeous kitchen she's always wanted - but there's one problem.

5.title: Hero Hubby
5.plot: A star athlete and selfless paramedic is no longer able to do the things he loves after doctors discover a brain tumor.

6.title: All My Children
6.plot: An amazing foster mother has seen over sixty children call her house 'home' over the years. Now the kids' reward mom with a makeover to thank her for changing their lives for the better - and the Makeover wish team ensure it's the perfect palace for this Super Mom.

7.title: Family Reunion
7.plot: A former foster mom never had a reason to update her house after all her kids moved out. The Makeover Wish team takes it on - but what good is a family room without family? A busload of loved ones from all over the globe is waiting around the corner for the best gift of all.

8.title: Courageous Clan
8.plot: A loving family tackle life head on and amaze friends and neighbors with their positive outlook - despite helping the four year-old deal with rare inoperable brain tumor. The Makeover wish team surprises this sporty family with a truckload of special gifts to enjoy together and celebrate life.

9.title: A Dramatic Change
9.plot: A vivacious drama teacher is at a rare loss for words after a former student surprises her with a $25,000 makeover.

10.title: Something to Sing About
10.plot: A talented singer and music instructor knows that every voice in this world counts. That's why she has dedicated her life to helping handicapped and unfortunate people sing their hearts out with passion and joy. And it's why the Makeover Wish Team is giving her a standing ovation and a gift that both she and her loving students can enjoy.

11.title: Animal House
11.plot: Whether saving wildlife from Canadian forest fires or running shelters in the rubble of Hurricane Katrina, an award-winning animal advocate tirelessly protects creatures big and small. Now her friends and volunteers are ready to reward her with a makeover that will wow her and the beloved pets that share her home.

12.title: The Donor
12.plot: Only six months after marriage, a young bride falls ill and watches her dreams of starting a family fade away. But her husband never thinks twice about what to do, donating his very own kidney to give her the gift of life. Now healthy and happy with a beautiful son, she's wants her soul mate to have a special place to relax and have fun.

13.title: Room for the Whole Family
13.plot: A loving family gets through a series of heartbreaking setbacks with love and compassion. The youngest - a wheelchair bound girl with a rare combination of disorders - is the shining light of the bunch, but obstacles and accessibility have always denied them a proper family room.

imdb.plot outline: aturing top designers, remarkable transformations and plenty of raw emotion, Makeover Wish performs $25,000 room makeovers for truly deserving individuals in need of a break. After sending their targets off on a surprise weekend getaway, the expert crew creates a superbly executed showpiece in just 72 hours. From a fabulous new bedroom to the world's coolest family room, every lavish detail is geared to enhance everyday life through beauty, function and design that is a gift of a lifetime.
imdb.title: Makeover Wish
plot: aturing top designers, remarkable transformations and plenty of raw emotion, _Makeover Wish_ (qv) performs $25,000 room makeovers for truly deserving individuals in need of a break. After sending their targets off on a surprise weekend getaway, the expert crew creates a superbly executed showpiece in just 72 hours. From a fabulous new bedroom to the world's coolest family room, every lavish detail is geared to enhance everyday life through beauty, function and design that is a gift of a lifetime.
